navLeftData.title: Sustainability
navLeftData.description: Paper industry adopts biodegradable materials and enhances recycling efforts.

navLeftData.title: Featured Projects
navLeftData.description: Showcasing innovative projects in paper production and recycling.

navLeftData.title: Innovation
navLeftData.description: New technologies in paper manufacturing increase efficiency.

navLeftData.title: Recycling
navLeftData.description: Recycling initiatives in the paper industry have grown significantly.

Machines.name: NS-015
Machines.introduction: The NS-015 is a high-performance paper cup machine designed for efficient production in medium to large scale enterprises. It combines reliability with speed, capable of producing up to 100 cups per minute.
Machines.parameters: Voltage: 220V, Power: 1500W
Machines.application: Ideal for producing paper cups of various sizes, from 6oz to 16oz, suitable for hot and cold beverages.
Machines.product_description: This machine features a robust stainless steel construction that ensures durability and hygiene standards are met. It includes PLC control for precise operation and minimal wastage.
Machines.technical_specification: Material: Stainless steel, Weight: 500kg
Machines.optional_add_ons: Custom cup size molds available upon request.
Machines.faqs: Q: What is the warranty period? A: 1-year warranty provided for parts and service.

Machines.name: NS-016
Machines.introduction: The NS-016 paper cup machine is designed for versatility and efficiency, catering to small to medium-scale enterprises. It offers reliable performance and ease of operation.
Machines.parameters: Voltage: 220V, Power: 1500W
Machines.application: Suitable for producing a variety of paper cup sizes, ranging from 4oz to 12oz, for both hot and cold beverages.
Machines.product_description: This machine is crafted from lightweight aluminum alloy, making it easy to transport and install. It features a user-friendly interface and low maintenance requirements.
Machines.technical_specification: Material: Aluminum alloy, Weight: 450kg
Machines.optional_add_ons: Automatic cup stacking unit available as an optional accessory.
Machines.faqs: Q: How many cups can it produce per minute? A: This machine can produce up to 80 cups per minute.

Machines.name: NS-017
Machines.introduction: The NS-017 paper cup machine is known for its precision and high-speed production capabilities, suitable for large-scale operations requiring consistent quality.
Machines.parameters: Voltage: 220V, Power: 1800W
Machines.application: Designed to produce paper cups with sizes ranging from 8oz to 20oz, catering to a wide range of beverage serving needs.
Machines.product_description: Built with durable components and advanced PLC control, this machine ensures minimal downtime and optimal output. It includes features for custom mold adjustments and easy maintenance.
Machines.technical_specification: Material: Stainless steel, Weight: 600kg
Machines.optional_add_ons: Additional molds for special cup designs available upon request.
Machines.faqs: Q: What material can this machine handle? A: It is capable of handling both single and double PE coated paper.

Machines.name: Paper Bowl Machine 01
Machines.introduction: The Paper Bowl Machine 01 is designed for high-volume production of paper bowls, offering precision and efficiency.
Machines.parameters: Voltage: 240V, Power: 1800W
Machines.application: Suitable for producing various sizes of paper bowls, ideal for both hot and cold food items.
Machines.product_description: This machine is equipped with advanced features for precise bowl forming and stacking, ensuring consistent quality output.
Machines.technical_specification: Material: Stainless steel, Weight: 700kg
Machines.optional_add_ons: Customizable bowl depth and diameter settings available.
Machines.faqs: Q: What is the production capacity of this machine? A: It can produce up to 120 bowls per minute.
Machines.related_product: Paper Bowl Machine 02, Paper Bowl Machine 03

Machines.name: Paper Flexo Machine
Machines.introduction: The Paper Flexo Machine is designed for printing on various paper surfaces, offering high-quality print results and flexibility.
Machines.parameters: Voltage: 220V, Power: 2000W
Machines.application: Ideal for printing logos, designs, and labels on paper cups, bowls, and plates.
Machines.product_description: This paper container machine or paper bowl making machine from Nessco is designed with high level of accuracy and international standards. This machine makes paper containers and bowls for food packaging and serving. The machines runs a whole procedure of paper feeding, bowl-fan wall sealing, oil lubrication, bottom punching, heating, rolling, rimming, rounding, and discharge as well.
Machines.technical_specification: Material: Aluminum alloy, Weight: 800kg
Machines.optional_add_ons: Additional color printing units available for multi-color designs.
Machines.faqs: Q: What is the printing speed of this machine? A: It can print up to 150 meters per minute.
Machines.related_product: Paper Flexo Machine 2, Paper Flexo Machine 3

item.name: Paper Bowl
item.description: Paper cups are disposable containers made from paper and often lined with plastic or wax to prevent liquid leakage. They are widely used in the beverage and food industry.

item.name: Paper Cups
item.description: Set up your paper cup plant with our high-speed machines for efficient, eco-friendly production. Enjoy rapid manufacturing with reduced energy consumption and operational costs.
